info.name: API System Collection Revised
info.description: Simplified Postman collection for testing the API system, including user registration, API creation, endpoint creation, and mock endpoint operations for /users, /products, /orders, /reviews.

request.description: Registers a new user and returns a JWT token and user details.
Logs in a user and returns a JWT token and user details.
Retrieves the profile of the authenticated user.
Updates the authenticated user's profile (username and email only).
Deletes the authenticated user's profile and associated data.
Retrieves all APIs owned by the authenticated user.
